humanum_full_description_en:
From " mouth " to " I ". Bronze and Warring States Chu scripts are upper and lower structures, and Xiaozhuan is left and right structures. Bronze inscriptions are used as names, and Chu bamboo slips are pronounced as " yi ". "Guodian Jane. "The Way of Faithfulness" Jane 8: "Faith, oh (righteousness) period (ji) also."

The original meaning of " oh " is chanting. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Oh, Yin Ye. From the mouth, my voice." For example, Han Yu in the Tang Dynasty "Remembering Dreams": "For those who are strong and non-young, seven words, six-character ordinary language is difficult." Northern Song Dynasty Mei Yao Chen "Diao Shi Manqing": "Oh alone, in the autumn dew, how can you care about your clothes?"

" Oh " is also used as an interjection to express understanding and awakening. For example, "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 25: "Lin Daiyu smiled and said: "Oh, but I forgot, thank you very much."" "The Scholars" Chapter 30: "Du Shenqing was taken aback and said, "Oh! You are here. Xia Shi!"
humanum_short_description_en: From " mouth " to " me ". The original meaning is chanting.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「我」。金文和戰國楚系文字為上下結構，小篆為左右結構。金文用作人名，楚簡讀為「義」。《郭店簡．忠信之道》簡8：「信，哦（義）之期（基）也。」

　　「哦」的本義是吟哦、吟誦。《說文新附》：「哦，吟也。从口，我聲。」如唐代韓愈〈記夢〉：「壯非少者哦七言，六字常語一字難。」北宋梅堯臣〈弔石曼卿〉：「獨哦秋露中，豈顧衣裘溼。」

　　「哦」後亦作嘆詞，表示領會、醒悟。如《紅樓夢》第25回：「林黛玉笑道：『哦，可是倒忘了，多謝多謝。』」《儒林外史》第30回：「杜慎卿喫了一驚，說道：『哦！你就是來霞士！』」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「我」。本義是吟哦、吟誦。

從「 口 」，「 我 」。金文和戰國楚系文字為上下結構，小篆為左右結構。金文用作人名，楚簡讀為「 義 」。《郭店簡．忠信之道》簡8：「信，哦（義）之期（基）也。」 「 哦 」的本義是吟哦、吟誦。《說文新附》：「哦，吟也。从口，我聲。」如唐代韓愈〈記夢〉：「壯非少者哦七言，六字常語一字難。」北宋梅堯臣〈弔石曼卿〉：「獨哦秋露中，豈顧衣裘溼。」 「 哦 」後亦作嘆詞，表示領會、醒悟。如《紅樓夢》第25回：「林黛玉笑道：『哦，可是倒忘了，多謝多謝。』」《儒林外史》第30回：「杜慎卿喫了一驚，說道：『哦！你就是來霞士！』」

Bronze inscriptions are used as names, and Chu bamboo slips are pronounced as " yi". "Guodian Jane. "The Way of Faithfulness" Jane 8: "Faith, oh (righteousness) period (ji) also." The original meaning of " oh" is chanting. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Oh, Yin Ye. From the mouth, my voice." For example, Han Yu in the Tang Dynasty "Remembering Dreams": "For those who are strong and non-young, seven words, six-character ordinary language is difficult." Northern Song Dynasty Mei Yao Chen "Diao Shi Manqing": "Oh alone, in the autumn dew, how can you care about your clothes?" " Oh" is also used as an interjection to express understanding and awakening. For example, "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 25: "Lin Daiyu smiled and said: "Oh, but I forgot, thank you very much."" 哦字的基本解释

哦
ó
叹词，表示疑问、惊奇等：哦，是怎么回事？

哦
ò
叹词，表示领会、醒悟：哦，我明白了。

哦
é
〔吟哦〕有节奏地诵读诗文。

哦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［é］
［《廣韻》五何切，平歌，疑。］
吟咏。
[②]［ó］
叹词。表示惊讶，疑惑等。
[③]［ò］
叹词。表示领会、醒悟或应答。

哦字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　哦； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页190第09
【唐韻】五何切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】牛何切，?音俄。【說文】吟也。　又【集韻】語可切，音我。義同。　【集韻】或作誐。

Первоначальное значение - пение и пение.
